visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series named 'Series 1' and 'Series 2' with the provided data. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include disabling the tooltip, setting chart margins, and styling the background and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The x-axis represents months, and the y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius. The chart has two data series named 'Series 1' and 'Series 2', each with corresponding temperature data. Custom colors are applied to the series for better differentiation. Additional configurations include disabling the tooltip, setting chart margins for better spacing, and styling the background and legend for a clean and readable appearance.
